reviews.review: Mecânica de jogo ultrapassada basicamente a mesma do final dos anos 90, extremamente repetitivo. Infestado de hack e comunidade altamente tóxica.
Gran juego, pero hace falta que limpien mas la comunidad de los cheaters
Buen juego en el que el trabajo en equipo es recompensado y divertido. Muy recomendable.
This game is a very good game. I think that because i like it :)

This game is dying faster and faster and the only blame should be put to valve.
At first there is nothing new to the game except for the "NEW REALISTIC GUNSOUNDS" (even the dogs laugh at them) and a new map which clearly nearly everyone hates even the pros (how many times this map is the decider and never a pick of a team). BUT the main problem of this game is mostly the Russian players (or other soviet remnants like ukranian, polish, from Belarus etc. none from a western and civilized country), the plague of this game, that form parties and either you speak russian or you get kicked. Finally let's not forget that if someone reports a hacker he must rely on someone's else judgement for a permanent ban cause valve has neither a good anticheat software nor cares about this game anymore especially ever since it's for free.
Good Job Valve Programmers!!!!

When you start playing you may feel that this game is too simple and that there's not much to do. After a while you will start feeling the need to play it. You won't know precisely why, but something will make you click on that green play button again. Idk, maybe the extremely in-depth tactical aspect of it or maybe the satisfying sound of a headshot. Give CSGO a chance and you will end up playing hundreds of hours.
